aboutMe.description: I am a Fullstack JavaScript Developer & Senior Embedded Software Developer with over 25 years of experience in the field. I have a Master of Science in Computer Science from University of New Haven (CT, USA), and a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from Royal Institute of Technology (Stockholm, Sweden). I have worked in various roles, including Senior Embedded Software Consultant, Senior Software Engineer, Project Leader, Software Manager, and Sr. Applications Engineer. I have a wide range of skills, including JavaScript, C, C++, C#, Python, and ARM assembler. My last position was Senior Embedded Software Consultant at Evidente ES East AB, where I worked as a consultant for 5 years. I am passionate about software development and enjoy working on challenging projects that push me to learn new skills and technologies.

Designed and built a complete test environment for the Transcoder.

Created the Transcoder test application (using SmartDSP OS and various other Freescale software packages) running on Freescale'’'s MSC8101 & MSC8122 & 8144 DSP. This application was later used as a reference design for the Transcoder application to be part of the Ericsson IMS gateway.

Software Development, System Design, Applications Engineering, Network Administration, Webmaster, Search Engine Optimization, Testing of new products, Marketing, and Technical Support.

MFC / Win 32 programming in a multithreaded real time environment.
